name: Krista Dreyer
what_you_do: FUNancial Freedom offers educational programs designed to teach financial literacy to children and teenagers through engaging content and interactive learning experiences.
who_you_serve: They serve kids aged 7-12 and teens aged 13-17, focusing on making financial education relatable and fun for younger audiences.
